column1: freakmamma,"2011-12-14T01:45:13.783Z","A Sweet Find For Belville Collectors","
I really wanted this for the different colored wands but
everything in the pack was completely usable.<span style=""mso-spacerun:yes"">&nbsp
The crown is a really nice piece but the flowered flat tile with single
row of studs is what really surprised me.<span style=""mso-spacerun:yes"">&nbsp
So many uses for it that I wish I would have ordered more of these when
prong jewels come in handy for a lot of different themes, even Power Miners /
smaller add on packs like this for some of the series that are active
to drop ten or fifteen dollars to get accessories isn't something most people
girlie pack, it is a nice find for Belville fanatics.
